WorkItem.Description:
As the word indicates ModernUI, I have seen most of the Controls like Button, TextBox, ComboBox, ListBoxItem, ContextMenuItem doesn't not have height what we see in Windows Store Applications, somewhere around 30px

I would suggest the mui implement this for all controls stated above and there are few other controls like DataGridRowHeader, DataGridRow, ListViewRow etc.

I have implemented the same in my applications. If you like I will create a fork for you to merge the changes.

I have seen the sample demo app and XAML Spy in which the controls look small.
WorkItem.Summary: Suggestion: Make default Height for most controls to ModernUI standard.
